user_instruction: 'Send an email to the parents about coordinating the Oakwood Owlets'"'"' group project. You can check out my Gmail and NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Coordinating the Oakwood Owlets’ Upcoming Group Project – Your Input Needed

Dear Oakwood Owlet Families,

I hope you’re all doing well! As we get ready to launch the Owlets’ next group project, I’d love to gather a few key details from each of you so we can organize materials, schedules, and parent support efficiently.

Could you kindly reply by this Friday (___/___) with the following information?

1. Availability for a brief parent planning call (30 minutes) early next week  
   • Preferred day(s)/time(s): _____________________

2. Any supplies or resources you already have at home that might be useful (e.g., poster boards, craft items, recycled materials, small tools, etc.):  
   • Items you can contribute: _____________________

3. Whether you’re interested in helping in one of these areas (feel free to check more than one):  
   ☐ In-class helper (during building/assembly days)  
   ☐ Materials coordinator (collecting, labeling, and bringing supplies)  
   ☐ Presentation coach (supporting students’ final run-throughs)  
   ☐ Photographer/videographer for project documentation  
   ☐ At-home helper (prepping materials or printing items)

4. Any allergies or special considerations we should keep in mind for your child when handling project materials:  
   • Notes: _____________________

Additional Details & Resources:  
• Gmail Thread – I’ve shared an overview email with preliminary project goals and the tentative timeline.  
• Notion Board – The “Owlets Project Hub” workspace contains a live checklist, resource wish-list, and the working calendar.

Please take a moment to review those two resources when you have a chance; they will give helpful context as you fill in the details above.

Thank you so much for your continued support. Your involvement makes a tremendous difference in the students’ enthusiasm and success. If you have any questions, don’t hesitate to reach out.

Warm regards,

[Your Name]  
On behalf of Ms. Jane (Oakwood Owlets’ Teacher)  
[Your Email] | [Your Phone]

final_output:
